summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests for the MultiControlNet inpainting pipeline, creating mock components and inputs, initializing model weights, and verifying core behaviors such as attention slicing, control guidance toggling, batch versus single inference consistency, handling of unimplemented save functionality, and integration with xformers attention.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the MultiControlNet inpainting pipeline during development, enabling rapid detection of regressions and ensuring reliable performance for image editing applications.
